attributes.action: ...put it to the House of Commons, House of Lords and all parties without distinction that they do not have and never had the right to subjugate the British people to European powers or control and that we reject any supposition that Parliament ever had such power.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Signees to this petition instruct the government that past and previous governments actions that devolved powers to foreign political institutions, namely the European Union and associated institutions are not recognised by us. We therefore register that we are not bound by any laws or directives they pass in the name of those European institutions and we humbly suggest that they risk leading the nation towards inevitable civil disobedience if they persist in their undemocratic political unification with Europe - that they; not those accused of civil disobedience; are the cause, and that the ascendancy of British control for British subjects without foreign input can be the only just outcome.
